Module apocalypseRPG
Package org.cmpdl.arpg.attack

Interface WeaponAttack

All Known Implementing Classes:
BattleAxeAtk, DaggerAtk, DeathAtk, EnemyMgcAtk, EnemyPhysAtk, MysticStaffAtk
public interface WeaponAttack
Basic attacks and effects of weapons. Utilizes the visitor design pattern. Different weapons may have different damage scaling, types, and effects. Interface used for polymorphism
Author:
cmpdl

    • useEffect

      void useEffect()
